title.narrative: Environmentally sound management of municipal and hazardous solid waste to reduce emission of unintentional POPs - Implementation Phase

description.narrative: .The project aims to reduce POPs releases from hazardous and municipal wastes by strengthening technical and institutional capacities of a group of private sectors which can sustain and replicate the best available technique and best environmental practice (BAT/BEP) demonstrated in the project within the context of the implementation of the National Implementation Plan (NIP) under the Stockholm Convention
